name: City Highlights Tour
description: Explore the iconic landmarks of Paris, including the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre Dame Cathedral.

name: Wine Tasting Tour in Champagne
description: Visit a Champagne region and learn about the production process, followed by a tasting of different Champagnes.

name: Temples and Gardens Tour
description: Visit some of Kyoto's most famous temples and gardens, including Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) and Arashiyama Bamboo Grove.

name: Geisha Experience Tour
description: Learn about the traditions and culture of geisha and enjoy a performance.
